ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []
    let v = []
  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-1){
    	array.push({
    		name:'📖['+x.volume_name+']📖',
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
            url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=1977'
      })
    })
  }
  array
</js>

<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result
</js>dl.B

@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.author: span.0@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result
</js>dl.B
ruleSearch.name: a.1@text

searchUrl:
@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

url += "/sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
$ = (a) => doc.select(a)
if (/function S2H/.test(result)) {
	function S2H(s){
        var r = [];
        for(var i=0;i<s.length/2;i++){
            r[r.length]= parseInt(s.substr(i*2,2), 16);
        }
        return r;
    }
    var str = S2H(String($('str').html()).replace(/\s/ig,''));
    var key = S2H(String(cookie.getKey(source.getKey(),'key')));
    var x = 0, ret = "";
    for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){
        var d = (str[i] + key[x]);
        if(d>255)d=d%255;
        ret+='%'+('0'+d.toString(16)).substr(-2,2);
        x++; if(x>=key.length) x=0;
    }
    var html = decodeURIComponent(decodeURI(ret));
    $('str').html(html);
}
doc</js>

<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result
</js>dl.B

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.author: dd.1@span.0@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
baseUrl = baseUrl.replace(/=$/, "")
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	try {
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
} catch(e) {result = ""} java.deleteFile(img)
}

result
</js>dl.B
ruleSearch.name: dt.0@text

searchUrl:
@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
baseUrl = baseUrl.replace(/=$/, "")
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	try {
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
} catch(e) {result = ""} java.deleteFile(img)
}

result
</js>dl.B

}
list;

<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
baseUrl = baseUrl.replace(/=$/, "")
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	try {
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
} catch(e) {result = ""} java.deleteFile(img)
}

result
</js>dl.B

@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "/sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr
